description:
En-o is at the grave of a man named Atsuyu.  He tells Yoko a story about him.  After Shoryu becomes En-o, En Kingdom regains peace.  He is always among the people to listen to their voice and catches the rumor of Gen State’s rebellion.  Enki, Rokuta, gets kidnapped by Koya, a boy who was raised by a monster like himself.  The boy’s boss, Atsuyu is in charge of Gen State, and asks Rokuta to be his hostage so En-o will accept his demand for riparian work for the people in Gen State.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Higashi no Watatsumi, Nishi no Soukai - Isshou
Sea God of the East, Azure Sea of the West - Chapter 1
Бог Моря на востоке, Океан на западе. Часть 1
東の海神 西の滄海 一章
